text: @curefinder That's a big problem with trying to define this "covid19"...it HAS no definition...because it's NOT NATURAL. Get that thru and let it percolate for a bit... It's NOT a flu bug, it's NOT a virus, it's NOT the plague, and it's not behaving like any afore-mentioned conditions. Next!
